Text.val: 19.12.2013 SH SCR18565 Changed IBAN/Bankaccount number on screen, removed BankID
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
on 14.3.2005 WJ SCR7948 extend screen fields
12.11.2003 SH SCR4796 Removed virtual from "LOCATE TO" for the selection
31.07.2003 SH SCR3879 Changed only CenterScreenInOnline to 'Y' if default = 'N'
30.04.2003 SH SCR3244 Position cursor on current row if one of the subprograms
27.03.2003 RR -> SCR3196 Implementation of shortcut handling
-- If only 1 record exist, than the OutputParameters are automaticliy
-- filled, with the values of this record, otherwise the selection-

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('[SCROPH106B1]: Select Bank account ledger changes')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*) from :1 where BDTL_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BDTL_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BDTL_BANKID = :4 and BDTL_BANKACCOUNT = ':5' and BDTL_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = ':6' and BDTL_DAILYRUNNUMBER = :7 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select BDTL_LGCH_ID from :1 where BDTL_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BDTL_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BDTL_BANKID = :4 and BDTL_BANKACCOUNT = ':5' and BDTL_DATDAILYSTATEMENT = ':6' and BDTL_DAILYRUNNUMBER = :7 for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
